These files have been missing all along, but this has now been revealed by #31386.

This leads to errors such as the one reported in 
https://groups.google.com/g/sage-devel/c/81unMG60MyU/m/iDXLIDc0EAAJ


CC:  @vbraun @dimpase @jhpalmieri @orlitzky
